TextView.android:text: There are a number of web apps that emulate a website development environment, allowing you to enter HTML, CSS and JavaScript and then display the result of that code when rendered as a website — all in one browser tab. Generally speaking these tools are quite easy, great for learning, and free (for basic features), and they host your rendered page at a unique web address. However, the basic features are pretty limited, and the apps usually don't provide hosting space for assets (like images). Try playing with some of these examples, and see which one you like the best: • JSFiddle • Thimble • JS Bin
